Summary: a cigar shaped UFO flew quickly kinda at an angle upward
divs: Sighting DetailsME and my son were walking are dogs at around 9:50 pm we were turning a corner when my son looked up at the sky and pointed up and said "look what is that". I looked up and there was this cigar shaped thing flying upward at an angle. We sat there and watched it fly at an angle for no more than 30 seconds or less. it looked again like a cigar and had a very faint trail behind it that was traveling way faster than any earth made craft we have ever seen. it slowed down for like 1 second and then took off into the night where we lost view of it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in St Louis
This sighting has never been favorited.
